name: Mythforge
description:
Mythforge is a "souls-like" action/rpg where you can combine your weapons/items to create new combinations of attacks, special skills and special items.

I am currently working on this project solo. Various asset packs have been used to develop the project to get it to this stage. 

This was my final project for university, but I'm planning to continue to work on it. This is not a finished project, so there are many placeholder objects and assets I'm planning to replace. 

I'm open to feedback. You can download the game right now and try it for free but donations are appreciated :)

Here is the link for the GDD if you are interested: Link

Note: Currently you need a gamepad to play the game, but you can use the inventory/equipment only with keyboard and mouse.
